text.en: Guru of my innate awareness, Padmasambhava,
Indivisible from my own kind root master, the lord of the Dharma;
I supplicate you as a guide for all of us wandering in saṃsāra,
text.en-trans: dak sok drowa drenpé depön ché

text.en: Pray lead us now, in the bardo and all future lives.
text.en-trans: di chi bardo küntu soldeb na

text.en: Care for us in this life and in all lives to come.
text.en-trans: kyé dang tserab trengwar jé zung né

text.en: May we accomplish the dual benefit of ourselves and others.
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi drubpar dzé du sol
